game_description: This virtual reality animation work is about a girl, Mil, who encounters, plays and interacts with a Kaiju. This VR film can be watched from three different viewpoints: the audience's perspective(default), the Kaiju's perspective, and Mil's perspective.
review_1: I am just super happy to see Toei making stuff for the Oculus Quest, this one is a short story with characters that appear to be from a tabletop experience, its short but well acted and worth experiencing. I really hope this is the start of a lot more stuff coming from the company to VR, they have a massive catalog of franchises that would be perfect for VR. Featured in Oculus Quest Seated Games Video - https://youtu.be/Naxha7wgbDQ
